change_summary.what_changed: The website's content has been updated with new blog posts, and the call for papers for the vLLM Featured Track at Ray Summit is now open.
specific_changes: New blog posts have been added, including 'Ray Summit 2025: Call for Proposals Closes on July 14th, 2025', 'Introducing KubeRay v1.4', and 'Open Source RL Libraries for LLMs'.
The call for papers for the vLLM Featured Track at Ray Summit is now open.
The website's layout and design have been updated.
